author: bago
msg: Make sure outer boundaries are always recognized when parsing nested content (MIME4J-56)
This introduce double bufferings but at least provide RFC compliant behaviour.
Also updated "missing-inner-boundary.msg" expected output to what Niklas suggested (corresponding to what RFC mandates).

author: markt
msg: Withdraw patch pending further investigation. Root cause appears to be my build environment rather than a bug.

author: sisbell
msg: Fixed unit tests. The new builder code reverses order of tags.

author: lektran
msg: Changed where the nowTimestamp variable is declared so that it is more widely available

author: bago
msg: Fix infinite loop on premature end (preamble) in multipart streams (MIME4J-52)
